name: How to Create AI Images with Gemini AI
description: Step-by-step guide to creating stunning AI-generated images using Gemini AI with effective prompts

step.name: Craft Your Prompt
step.text: Create a detailed, descriptive prompt that clearly communicates your vision. Include specific details about style, composition, colors, and mood.

step.name: Generate Image
step.text: Use your prompt in Gemini AI to generate your image. Experiment with different phrasings and details to refine your results.

step.name: Refine and Iterate
step.text: Analyze the generated image and make adjustments to your prompt. Try different styles, lighting conditions, or artistic references.

step.name: Share & Inspire
step.text: Share your successful prompts and images with the community to help others learn and get inspired for their own creations.
